title: Update application name from 'career guide' to 'CareerSphere'

requirements.summary: Update document title in index.html to 'CareerSphere - Your Career Path Navigator'
acceptanceCriteria: The <title> tag in frontend/index.html displays 'CareerSphere - Your Career Path Navigator'
No references to 'career guide' remain in the document title

file_operations.description: Update the <title> tag content to 'CareerSphere - Your Career Path Navigator', replacing any existing 'career guide' references

requirements.summary: Replace 'career guide' text with 'CareerSphere' in Home.tsx hero section
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section title displays 'CareerSphere' instead of 'career guide'

file_operations.description: Search for any instances of 'career guide' text in the hero section title and tagline, replace with 'CareerSphere' (case-sensitive with capital C and S)

requirements.summary: Replace 'career guide' references with 'CareerSphere' in About.tsx mission and vision statements
acceptanceCriteria: All instances of 'career guide' in About page content are replaced with 'CareerSphere'
Mission and vision statements reference 'CareerSphere' consistently

file_operations.description: Search for all instances of 'career guide' text in mission, vision, problem statement, and purpose sections, replace with 'CareerSphere' (case-sensitive with capital C and S)

requirements.summary: Search and replace 'career guide' with 'CareerSphere' across all remaining frontend components
acceptanceCriteria: No instances of 'career guide' remain in any frontend component files
All references use 'CareerSphere' consistently across the application
